title: How do I fully uninstall windows 10
body: Wondering how I can fully unistall LoL on windows 10, it's not longer in the remove programs section for some reason and literally can't find the files anywhere

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JXyMGFNg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-08T00:33:58.006+0000)
>
> you buy a mac

lmao dumbass no one wants to downgrade their computer.
last time i checked it was easy to uninstall from a mac.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JXyMGFNg,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-08T00:48:44.972+0000)
>
> last time i checked it was easy to uninstall from a mac.

it's easy to uninstall from a windows computer as well.

then Testikills obviously isnt having any problem then

in any case i was just poking fun at the fact every time someone with a mac has a problem there is always someone that says, 'mac, theres you're problem' so now that there is a windows problem i felt the windows people needed a reminder that it isn't perfect.
But Windows not being perfect is half the fun. xD
At the bottom of your screen there is a search option, search for "uninstall" and you'll find "apps and components, there just left click on LoL and remove.

1. Copy all important files to an external drive. Don't forget your bookmarks and everything 'My Documents' 'Temp' and 'App Data' (or any of those other silly yank locations).
2. Format your hard drive.
3. Reinstall old windows. 

Problem solved.
